column4: Hi, I just deleted everything in my /home/user folder by accident
how do I get it back?
I was not looking to do that
and I dont have my ircd services file saved anywhere else
again, please put the output of mount to a pastebin service
but its not a separate partition
do you have physical access to the machine?
if I did, I could do it
then in the meantime make sure that no read/writes are performed on that partition and contact the service of your server provider
creating an image of the partition is not a bad idea. Do you have any spare space on a different partition at hand?
I have an hdd I can write it on
Well, time to restart my IRC network. Again.
then you should be able to perform dd over ssh
you could still try extundelete on a mounted partition I guess  (assuming it was ext3 or ext4)
not with the tool mentioned, no
